alert.note: Alert for Brookings (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 25 at 7:06AM MST until December 25 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO MIDNIGHT CST TONIGHT... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY HAS EXPIRED... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches. * WHERE...In Minnesota, Lincoln, Lyon, Murray and Cottonwood Counties. In South Dakota, Brookings County. * WHEN...From noon today to midnight CST tonight. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The cold wind chills as low as 20 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Briefly heavy snowfall rates are possible this afternoon. Be prepared for rapid changes in visibility. Areas of blowing and drifting snow are also possible.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
